name: DJSG bug report
description: Report bug in DJSG.
title: "[DJ-SG] <title here>"
labels: ["Type: bug"]
body:
  - type: input
    id: nickname
    attributes:
      label: Your discord username
      placeholder: @someone
    validations:
      required: true
  - type: textarea
    id: what-happened
    attributes:
      label: What happened?
      value: | 
        When I ... happends. However I except ... to happen
    validations:
      required: true
  - type: markdown
    attributes:
      value: |
        Thanks for reporting bug!
